name: Tactical Vengeance: Play The Game
description:
Play 6 different Match with your friends or alone with Bots. Fight for your team to be the best team and win the Match! You can play Singleplayer and Multiplayer or PvP. Own Medals, Achievements and Playerlevel through the Matchs. Be the best of the Match is not always easy because you will die from lack of water or food. Make your own LAN Party and play together or play with new people in the hole world!

Play 6 Match Conquest, Kill Comfirmed, Team Deathmatch, Capture The Flag, Free For All, Rush.

Co-op multiplayer Play with your friends, or get new playmates. Play together and win the Match to be the best team.

9 starter weapons You can play with Rifles, Machinegun, pistols, shotgun, Sniper and Knife.

6 different starter Maps Play Match games in 6 differents starter Maps, which is from different locations around the the world and Fantasy.

Own Medals, Achievements and Playerlevel Through playing can you own Medals as collecting to your Playerprofile. Collect Achievements that you own through each Match. The more actively you play and helping your team, the higher your Level will be.

Food and Water You have to find food and water, so as not to die from lack of food and water.
